channel.title: Help this is anoying!
channel.description:
[font=times new roman]I NEED HELP![size=36pt][/size][/font]
So I Load rsps client and like 20 second later client crashes and says: (every client i use)
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=3336, t id=1180 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Arthur\Desktop\Moonscape Client\hs_err_pid3336.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help this is anoying!
item.dc:creator: @arthur323 arthur323
item.description:
@arthur323 wrote:

i dont get u can u show me a picture… upload it to imageshack

Read full topic

item.title: Help this is anoying!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:2, topic:354914”]Replace

Java [b]or[/b] Start Java

which is in your run.bat and then go through the filepath manually starting from your computer. In the end you should replace it with something similar:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Java.exe" INCLUDING THE “”[/quote]BBCode doesn’t work in code tags.

Read full topic

item.title: Help this is anoying!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Replace

Java [b]or[/b] Start Java

which is in your run.bat and then go through the filepath manually starting from your computer. In the end you should replace it with something similar:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Java.exe" INCLUDING THE “”

Read full topic
